name: Billin' around
description:
This game was made for SPPRO GameJam 28. 1. 2018.

This is my first playable game that I made. It might not look like much, but it took a lot of effort to get it to this point.

Thank you for playing and have a nice day :)

PS: If you have troubles, use the NO SAVE version because it is much more stable.
